title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 330.6 - Local rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 330.6 - Local rules and regulations

State Regulations

Each facility housing incarcerated individuals in protective
custody status shall promulgate rules and regulations for care and custody and
submit them to the deputy commissioner for facility operations for review and
approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
330.6

Amended

New

York State Register May 10, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 19, eff. 5/10/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
